PriceBookEntryDerivedPrice.name: PriceBookEntryDerivedPrice
PriceBookEntryDerivedPrice.description: Represents the price of a product that’s derived from another source such as a product or an asset.

ContributingProductId.description: Source product from which the derived price is calculated. The source product is associated with the derived price product.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization. Available only if the multicurrency feature is enabled.

DerivedPricingScope.description: Scope of the product based on which the derived price is calculated.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date and time when the derived pricing comes into effect.

EffectiveTo.description: Date and time when the derived pricing is no longer in effect.

Formula.description: Coded format of the formula used to calculate the derived price of a product from another product or asset.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the derived price record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

PricebookEntryId.description: Price book entry associated with the source product.

PricebookId.description: Price book associated with the source product.

PricingSource.description: Pricing type used to calculate the derived price of the product.

ProductId.description: Product associated with the derived pricing.

ProductSellingModelId.description: Product selling model associated with this record.
